DOC.brief_summary: Middle-aged old people fall risk assess invited multidisciplinary fall prevention program . This program consist adapted exercise program . Two session per week perform , 6 week supervise physiotherapist . At end program , measure physical condition self-efficacy repeat determine related-effect .
DOC.brief_title: Physical Condition Self-efficacy People With Fall Risk
DOC.criteria: Fall Risk ( Morse scale ) Had capacity walk independently
